  • Constructor Details

    • StarterCard

      public StarterCard(int id, String imgFront, String imgBack, String FNW, String FNE, String FSW, String FSE, String BNW, String BNE, String BSW, String BSE, String first, String second, String third)
      Constructor method
      Parameters:
      id - universal id of the card
      imgFront - string that contains the path to the .jpg
      imgBack - string that contains the path to the .jpg
      FNW - front north-west corner
      FNE - front north-east corner
      FSW - front south-west corner
      FSE - front south-east corner
      BNW - back north-west corner
      BNE - back north-est corner
      BSW - back south-west corner
      BSE - back south-east corner
      first - contains one possible kingdom in the middle of the front face of the card
      second - contains one possible kingdom in the middle of the front face of the card
      third - contains one possible kingdom in the middle of the front face of the card

  • Method Details

    • getCentralKingdom

      public Symbol[] getCentralKingdom()
      Getter for the kingdoms in the center of the card
      Returns:
      the kingdoms in the middle of the front face of the card

    • play

      public int play(Player player, Coords coords)
      Method used to place the StarterCard of the Player given as parameter, this also creates the Player's gameField
      Specified by:
      play in class PlayableCard
      Parameters:
      player - the one who plays the StarterCard
      coords - the position in which the Player wants to play it (in this case it doesn't matter since it's their first PlayableCard played)
      Returns:
      the number of points scored by placing the StarterCard (always 0)
